channel.title: Home on Freedom Boats Mallorca - Puerto Portals
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Freedom Boats Mallorca - Puerto Portals

item.title: Ana - a brand new 8m speed boat with a 250HP Engine
item.description: 8m speed boat with a 250HP outboard engine (9 PAX) Ana is the perfect boat to enjoy a nice day at the sea. With it’s brand new 250 HP outboard engine you can speed to any beach or cala around the Calvià area or you can even zip over to cabrera and spend the day there!

item.title: Alex - a brand new 8m speed boat with an outboard 250 HP engine
